description: This file defines a Python class ZendeskTools that provides methods to interact with the Zendesk API, including searching articles and handling authentication details. It imports external libraries such as requests and internal modules for logging and toolkit functionalities.

classes.name: ZendeskTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with the Zendesk API to search articles, requiring authentication details and company information.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the ZendeskTools class with optional authentication parameters and registers the search_zendesk method.

methods.name: search_zendesk
methods.description: Performs a search for articles in Zendesk Help Center matching the provided search string, returning a JSON string of article bodies without HTML tags.
